done.description: If the account exists, we will send an email to you. Please check your email inbox and follow the instructions.
done.title: All Done!

demo.title: Demo Bot
demo.warning: Please choose a chatbot for test first.

placeholder.name: Give it a robot-like name e.g. Jarvis
placeholder.greetingMsg: The first message your bot speaks e.g. "Hello!"
placeholder.failedMsg: The bot will speak this message if it fails to understand e.g. "Sorry, I don't understand."
placeholder.postbackMsg: The message when the bot offers recommendation e.g. "Please select one"

delete.title: Confirm Delete Bot
delete.warning: Are you sure you want to delete bot <0><0></0></0> ? This action cannot be undone.
delete.prompt_password: Please input your password to confirm.

line.title: Line Setting
line.ignoreDescription: Add users by their display name. Bot will not respond to users in this list.
line.description: When you have already created a chatbot in our platform, activate it and follow the instructions to connect it to a LINE Channel.

steps._1: If you don't have a LINE account, create a LINE account.
steps._2: If you have a LINE account, go to <0>LINE developers page</0> and click <1>Messaging API</1>.
steps._3: Click <0>Add new provider</0> button from the left menu. Follow the instructions to create a provider.
steps._4: After creating the provider, click on <0>Messaging API</0> and fill in the information to create a new channel.
steps._5: After creating the channel, click on the channel you just created.
steps._6: In <0>Messaging settings</0> section, set <1>Use webhooks</1> to <2>Enabled</2>.
steps._7: Issue a new <0>Channel access token</0> and copy it to our platform <1></1>.
steps._8: Move to <0>Basic Information</0> section. Copy the <1>Channel secret</1> and paste it to <2></2> in our platform.
steps._9: Copy the <0></0> from our platform, paste it into <1>Webhook URL</1> field and click <2>Verify</2>.
steps._10: Now you can use our chatbot on your LINE.

facebook.title: Facebook Setting
facebook.ignoreDescription: Add users by their display name. Bot will not respond to users in this list.
facebook.description: When you have already created a chatbot in our platform, activate it and follow the instructions to connect it to a Fans Page.

steps._1: If you don't have a Fans Page, create a Fans Page.
steps._2: If you don't have a Facebook account, please create an account.
steps._3: If you already have a Facebook account, go to <0>Facebook for Developers</0> page.
steps._4: In Facebook for Developers page, look for <0>My Apps</0> on the top right of the page and choose <1>Add New App</1>.
steps._5: After creating the new apps, click <0>Set Up</0> on <1>Messenger</1>.
steps._6: Find <0>Token Generation</0> section and select your Fans Page, it will display a <1>Page Access Token</1>.
steps._7: After generating <0>Page Access Token</0>, copy it to our platform's <1></1>.
steps._8: Fill in <0></0> text box on our platform with "Hello".
steps._9: Back to Facebook. Find <0>Webhooks</0> and click on <1>Setup Webhooks</1>.
steps._10: Copy <0></0> from our platform and paste it to <1>Callback URL</1> in Facebook.
steps._11: In our platform page, make sure <0></0> is the same as in Facebook's <1>Verify Token</1>, and click on <2></2> button.
steps._12: Back to Facebook. In <0>Subscription Fields</0> section, check <1>messages</1> and click on <2>Verify and Save</2>.
steps._13: If no any errors from above, you can select your Fans Page in Webhooks field, and click on <0>Subscribe</0> button.
steps._14: Find <0>App Review for Messenger</0> section, click on <1>Add to Submission</1> for <2>page_messaging</2>.
steps._15: Now you can start chatting with your Fans Page.

web.title: Web Chat Plugin
web.description: Activate this platform and copy the following script and paste it before the body closing tag (</body>) of your website.
web.custDescription: System does not save any customization data. Please remember to copy the script before leaving this page

domains.title: Trusted Domains
domains.description: Protect Web Chat Plugin from being added to unauthorized sites. Web Chat Plugin will only work on the domains you listed below. If you want to enable Preview, please remember to add this site's domain into the list. You may disable this feature by leaving it empty.

api.title: API Setting
api.description: Please read the API Documentation on how to use Vendor ID to connect with our API.

delete_modal.title: Delete Group
delete_modal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this group?

batch.popup: Test with multiple questions at once
batch.description: Test file format is comma-separated values (CSV). Each line is structured as [question,expected answer]. Expected answer is optional.
batch.description2: The CSV file can be created using any spreadsheet applications of your choice (e.g. Google Sheet, Microsoft Excel, LibreOffice Calc, etc)
batch.question: Question

reply.title: Reply
reply.failedMsg_desc: Message sent by the bot when it fails to understand.
reply.greetingMsg_desc: Message sent by the bot in the beginning of conversation.

root.title: Payload Structure
root.type_desc: "message" if the message is a plain text, "postback" if the message is a reply from a previously provided choices.

message.title: Message Structure
message.oriQue_desc: The original question asked by the user. Required if type="postback"

reply.title: Reply
reply.success_desc: Indicates if the last message is understood by the bot. True if the bot understands, false otherwise.
reply.oriQue_desc: The original question from the user

data.title: Data Structure
data.text_desc: Reply content. Only appears when type="text"
data.title_desc: Choice title. Only appears when type="list"

choice.title: Choice Structure - type="list"
choice.id_desc: Choice ID. Used when sending request with type="postback"
choice.oriQue_desc: Original question asked by the user
choice.text_desc: Question similar to the question asked by the user.
